review.comment: Fahrenheit created a great website for my business and have been very responsive and helpful in making updates as they were needed! I would recommend them to anyone who is looking for website design and hosting!

We’re a ventured funded company that was looking for a partner to help us with some heavy-duty software development. Our needs were very specific, hence, our inability to find a solution off the shelf. We interviewed several companies and ended up deciding on Fahrenheit for a few reasons. First, the fact that they picked up their phones. That may seem like a no-brainer but let me tell you…many of these shops are simply not reliable. Another point that drove us to FM was their understanding of our needs. We explained once and they expanded on it as if the thing was their own idea…they offered a lot of insight and we enjoyed getting their perspective on an otherwise very complex application. The project lasted several months and they kept their head down until it was finished. We’ll be using them again for sure.

Seems like the reviews here are echoing similar vibes, which we were able to confirm after just a couple of meetings with the Fahrenheit team. Their digital strategy team, albeit small (4 people) at the time of our encounter, was incredibly well versed in digital strategy and their insights were very valuable and instrumental in our decision making process. If you engage with them in digital marketing, you’ll receive these video updates where they walk you through the progress of your campaign and I have to say, it is to me much more insightful than a hundred pages with charts and meaningless abstracts. I also like the fact that their agreements are month to month. Puts them on a position to have to perform in order to secure my business. I like that.

Our company came to Fahrenheit with the objective of creating a web experience for our clients and potential clients that reflected our culture and values. The team is exceedingly responsive, always offering thoughtful insights and bringing to light things we didn’t even consider at first glance. We have found that their experience is a valuable asset for us as we look to further define our brand and reach within our vertical.

We hired Fahrenheit Marketing to help us with marketing automation and email marketing in general. They were able to offer us the tool (SharpSpring) for a fraction of the cost found on the platform’s website and they also have the chops to manage a granular digital campaign. We’ve been empowered with data we never thought available and that, in our business, is a game changer.
Was as invested in the success of my business and product as if they were an equal partner. Best experience I've had.

We needed web re-design and ecommerce functionality added during a peak time of sales for our online business.  Fahrenheit came through and built out exactly what we needed.  The really genius concept they implemented when configuring the server environment was build our wordpress site with version control on GitLab using CI/CD, which has been amazing not to worry about breaking the site with any future updates or code changes.  Great team their technical CTO Tim really knows his stuff as well.

A few weeks ago I reached out to Fahrenheit Marketing and had an initial Zoom call with Ricardo to discuss developing a website and doing some marketing for my company, Bridge To Shore Interventions.  I was very much impressed with his knowledge and thoroughness.   After the zoom call it got even better.  Ricardo sent me an email with several presentations describing How & Why they do what they do.  Ricardo has since taken so much time out of his busy schedule to help me navigate and determine the best option for my company.  He was not "attached" to the idea I was going to possibly use his services but yet really cared that I was informed properly, pros & cons so that I could make an informed decision.  I would refer anyone to Ricardo, hands down.  Please don't hesitate to call them. You won't regret it.  - Jay Schneider (Founder of Bridge To Shore Interventions)

Do not sign any agreements with them. They promise to meet deadlines and provide great ideas and simply struggle to provide once  the agreement is signed.

Their designers are very inexperienced and do not communicate. I would not fall into their retainer agreement.
review.review_reply: We have looked through our records and in 13 years of operation we cannot locate a single record with the name of "Emily Rivera". It is also interesting that there are only 2 reviews associated with this email, both of which are 1 star reviews in the same day. While this appears to be a fraudulent review from a potential competitor or disgruntled associate, we would welcome the opportunity to address this grievance if indeed there is anything to be addressed. As far as our design capability, I think our portfolio speaks much louder than any person hiding behind a fake email spreading lies on the web. We're standing by. If you have been wronged, we will make it right. ALWAYS.
Thank you, Madelyn. Your business has always held a special place in our hearts. 9 years and counting!
Thank you, Robert. Giving our clients and partners an inside view of our operation is often times what it takes to get them to believe!

review.comment: A1 Customer Service - dedicated to meeting their clients particular needs and catapulting their clients to the next level with proven methods and techniques.
review.review_reply: Thank you, Brandon. It's our craft!

review.comment: Really great group of people with a passion for what they're doing!
review.review_reply: Thank you for the sweet words, Abby.

review.comment: I have been a client of Fahrenheit Marketing for over 7 years.  Ricardo and his team have been excellent over the years adapting to changes in dentistry's market trends as well as starting new campaigns to increase new patients and revenues.  My website is up to date and constantly gets upgrades and new content to reflect my changing practice.  Ricardo has been a pleasure to work with and easy to talk to when I had questions or concerns.
review.review_reply: Working with people who understand our vision and what it means to build a brand over time is truly a privilege. Thank you for your faithful support. Nothing gives us more joy than to celebrate the success of our clients. Here's to another 7 years!

review.comment:
Deadbeats.  Don't follow through with agreements, promise clients fast turnarounds on deadlines and then completely fail to deliver.

They also don't pay contractors and employees.  Designers and developers are anti-social, nasty people.  Avoid.
review.review_reply: Our research points to the fact that "Bill" is not Bill at all. He was a developer hired by Fahrenheit who grossly misrepresented his skills and when challenged on the matter, abandoned his post and to this day, we have yet to hear from him. "Bill's" character is a bit questionable as you can see that he created a special email in hopes we wouldn't trace it back to him. There's only one review attached to this email, our very own 1 star review.

review.comment: Fahrenheit Marketing team has greatly helped us with some of our internal marketing projects, from content creation for our website to various marketing tips and tricks that we have incorporated into our lead generation process. I want especially say thanks to Ricardo, the principal, who is a brilliant marketing strategist with an impressive arsenal of ideas and experience how to streamline the inbound marketing and generate more revenue.
review.review_reply: Thank you for the kind words. Always a pleasure working with you all.

review.comment: Ricardo is talented and honest. He has created a great marketing agency.
review.review_reply: Thank you for the kind words. It's been a long journey for us and we have learned a lot along the way!

review.comment: The guys are the bomb. Not the cheapest for sure,but man,do theor delivery. We enjoyed the process of rebanding our medical company with Fahrenheit. They were insightful and provide us with a brand that will endure. After running our company for 14 years it was time to get our brand together professionally and we turned to Fahrenheit to get the job done. They were super responsive,all over us really,and the end result sparks for itself. We now have a successful brand/value prop that matches our successful run.
review.review_reply: Adrian, thank you for the kind words. Cheap is certainly not a word that goes along with our services, but as you mentioned, the quality of our work is always in keeping with our costs. Pleasure working with your company.

review.comment: I've worked with Fahrenheit marketing on three major projects and they have exceeded my expectations on all three.  I feel very confident recommending them to anyone looking for a beautiful, functional and modern website or an integrated marketing campaign.  The people at Fahrenheit Marketing are creative thinkers who are able to execute.
review.review_reply: Working with Erin has always been a tremendous joy, and a privilege. Erin has held senior roles in the likes of Nickelodeon, DnB and more. Thank you for the kind words, Erin. Come to think of it, your contributions and partnership have greatly shaped the company we are today.

review.comment: Fahrenheit Marketing helped us redesign an existing website that was older, not very engaging, and needed a complete overhaul, including adding an easy way for us to manage content going forward. They did an absolutely amazing job in all aspects of the project.  The project came in on time and was on budget. The design options presented to us were excellent. Communication on the entire project was smooth, and there we zero "gotchas"! I will use them again, and so should you.
review.review_reply: Thank you, Derek, for such kind remarks. We have enjoyed working with you thoroughly and we look forward to the next project. We're standing by, ready when you are.

review.comment: Ricardo and his team are innovative, creative thinkers who possess both the skills and ambition to consistently deliver high quality work. I've worked with Fahrenheit on numerous web-based projects and continue to be blown away. Aside from their work, what really sets Fahrenheit apart from other firms is how they manage and foster client relationships. I know that when I call Fahrenheit I'm speaking to a familiar voice who knows my projects inside and out. I thoroughly enjoy collaborating with Fahrenheit and would recommend them to anyone looking for a web firm.
review.review_reply: Sophia, thank you so much for your kind remarks. Working with you has been a true blessing and we have enjoyed your professionalism and partnership over the years.

review.comment: I love working with Fahrenheit. I feel like they are more of an extension of my team instead of a firm that does work for me.  I can always trust that I can come to them with a challenge or project and they will create a innovative, well-thought out plan/product. The final product is always creative, well-designed, and functional.  I look forward to continuing to work with them for many years.
review.review_reply: Staci, your words carry a great deal of weight with us here at Fahrenheit. We have worked together for nearly 7 years and we've completed countless projects together. Thank you for your trust and support over the years. Fahrenheit is grateful for clients like yourself who have given us so much visibility and opportunity. Our most humble thanks!

review.comment: Fahrenheit Marketing did a fabulous job designing a logo and website that fit the needs of our start up. Fahrenheit Marketing is chock full of design and marketing talent. Having a quality logo displayed across all our marketing materials and website gave us an edge over our competition. It made our brand more appealing and memorable, which increased profits and contributed to our success as a company.
review.review_reply: Kurt, we enjoyed the process thoroughly and we look forward to future engagements. All the best!

review.comment:
Fahrenheit created a top notch website for our association that surpasses by far all of our past websites.  The visual appeal and easy navigation are the most obvious aspects but I was most impressed when we asked them to give us the ability to edit items on the website ourselves vs going through them for adjustments.   I expected to have a fairly limited administering role on the contents but was amazed, happy and surprised to find the incredible level of access and abilities that we were given.  Not only that, but the incredible team at Fahrenheit were more than happy to take the time to give us thorough training on administering the website.  It was not complicated at all and Fahrenheit deserves roaring applause for the intuitive nature and well laid out editing process for our website.

I could not be happier with our decision to go with Fahrenheit Marketing and would highly recommend them to you if you are tired of a cluttered, boring website.
review.review_reply: When we designed the Texas Healthcare Association website, we had no idea we'd make so many friends along the way. It is our pleasure to continue to support you all over the years. We look forward to the redesign some time down the road.

review.comment: I have been working with Ricardo and Co. for about 10 months now and am very pleased with him and the staff at Fahrenheit. They have worked very hard for our firm and have already gotten great results. They are also very responsive to any questions or concerns that I have and keep me informed as we move through the SEO and site management process. I highly recommend Fahrenheit Marketing.
review.review_reply: Paul, thank you for the kind words. Working with clients like yourself makes it all worth it getting up everyday and giving 110%, over and over again. We appreciate you.

review.comment: I started my practice from scratch in a very competitive area near Austin. This Marketing Company helped my website get optimized and got the phones ringing very quickly! I was out of the red and going strong in just a few months. After 3 years Ricardo and his staff still give us incredible service and are helping my practice to grow in ways I didn't think possible! Thank you Fahrenheit!!!
review.review_reply: Thank you for the kind words, Robert. It's taken me long enough to do this but here I am. I am so proud of where you stand today and I am also proud to have been a part of your success story. Marketing top notch professionals like you isn't really all that hard...your patients tell the story much better than any marketing firm could ever hope to. Thanks again!

review.comment: Fahrenheit Marketing has handled all of my SEO for almost 9 months now. They built a great website for my law firm, and their customer service is first class. I would highly recommend them to any company looking to make their presence felt on the internet.
review.review_reply: Thank you for the kind words, Blair. Always a pleasure working with you.
